Html:
Hi,
I downloaded latest source code version. When I try to compile the solution those files Core/ReferenceHelper.cs and SeekErrorMemoryStream.cs are missing.
Is it a source control problem? or I did something wrong?
Thanks

Andrea

Hi,
the same happened to me. I don't think we did something wrong, the files cannot be found in source browser either.

John
You are both right. For some reason they were missing from source control. They should be there now
